programme.title: Shark Busters
programme.desc: A police inspector's $400,000 credit card debt becomes a wedge that allows his squad to bust a ring of loan sharks. Stars Danny Lee

programme.title: Black Magic
programme.desc: Ti Lung plays a helpless man who is under the spell of an evil witch doctor in this bone-chilling tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: Sex Beyond the Grave
programme.desc: An unspeakable act of cruelty that tortures a beautiful woman to her death sets the stage for horror, when she returns to haunt a professor and his family.

programme.title: The Lady Is the Boss
programme.desc: A martial arts sifu and a hip marketing wiz have to overlook their differences to outsmart gangsters who are trying to take them down.

programme.title: Challenge of the Gamesters
programme.desc: Director Wong Jing's earliest blockbuster is packed with Japanese spies, Shanghai tycoons, beautiful starlets, and twists and turns on the gambling table.

programme.title: Legendary Weapons of China
programme.desc: When a top boxer (Lau Kar Leung) refuses to obey an imperial eunuch, other martial arts experts are sent to hunt him down and kill him.

programme.title: Law or Justice
programme.desc: GHA Best Actress Dodo Cheng co-stars alongside Alex Man in this drama, in which a man is acquitted, only to fault again when he rapes the victim's sister.

programme.title: The Thunderbolt Fist
programme.desc: To save his son from being killed, the head of the Ping Pai Boxing Institute sends his son to be hidden by a master fighter. Will the boy prove a hero?

programme.title: The Wandering Swordsman
programme.desc: This entertaining 'Robin Hood' epic features a hero who steals from the thieves and gives to the poor which sets the thieves on the warpath.

programme.title: Oath of Death
programme.desc: When Sung Dynasty patriot Chin Liang runs afoul of a corrupt acquaintance, he is forced to avenge the villain's treachery via a self-sacrificing oath.

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: An alluring female fairy seeks love among mortals and finds it in a man who takes care of an orphanage.

programme.title: Swordsman at Large
programme.desc: Wei Hung plays the Swordsman At Large, in this deceitful tale of bandits, beauties and blade masters who battle for glory.

programme.title: The Last Tempest
programme.desc: The court intrigues, politicking, bickering and backstabbing continues in this sequel to The Empress Dowager. Starring Lisa Lu.

programme.title: Shock Wave
programme.desc: Superstar Andy Lau stars as a bomb specialist set on capturing a wanted criminal called Blast in this action-drama. However, will he be able to do it in time when Blast threatens a massacre?

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Soon after an important financial document is stolen from the computer of analyst Siu-yu, her boss receives an email demanding a relatively small ransom. Is this just the tip of an iceberg?

programme.title: Midnight Diner
programme.desc: HKFA Best Actor, Tony Leung Ka Fai, stars & directs this charming human drama set against a diner that opens till the wee hours - where compassion is always on the menu.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: To escape a love affair gone bad, Yanny heads to San Jose to visit an old friend, Ling, and her husband. But what seems an ideal, carefree existence hides some unspeakable secrets.

programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: In this romance, a lady PR officer at a Macau casino & a real estate agent in California find themselves connected by destiny and a mysterious novel.
Starring Irene Wan, Taiwanese singer Kenji Wu & Korea's Song Ji Kyo, this film captures the experiences of three generations born between the 70s - 90s

programme.title: Dealer Healer
programme.desc: Sean Lau, Louis Koo, Gordon Lam & Zhang Jin star in this blockbuster biography of Chen Hua - a former underworld kingpin and drug dealer who finds a new lease of life.

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: Based on a true story, a girl named Suki aspire to fulfill her dream after leaving with her cheating boyfriend. Later, when invited to attend his wedding, she schemes to have her revenge.

programme.title: Kung Fu Yoga
programme.desc: Jackie Chan's highest box office masterpiece! This one billion global box office hit depicts an archeology professor and his team in search of a lost ancient Indian treasure.

programme.title: Chinese Odyssey 2002
programme.desc: A young emperor & his cross-dressing sister, and a restaurant-owning wanderer & his sibling descends into a swirl of gender confusion, slapstick antics & romance.

programme.title: Cold War
programme.desc: Winner of 9 awards at the 32nd Hong Kong Film Awards! When a police van is hijacked, Deputy Commissioner M.B Lee launches a rescue operation codenamed Cold War.

programme.title: As Tears Go By
programme.desc: Wah and Fly are cousins and best buddies but Wah is hesitant to maintain their relationship as he is involved with the mob. Then, Fly offended a mob boss one day, forcing Wah to interfere.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: As business at his boxing studio begins to falter, Kit Fok, an unbeaten underground fighter, must take on a final match against an intimidating adversary to keep it alive.

programme.desc: When beautiful superstar singer Rachel Marron receives death threats, she hires Frank Farmer, the best bodyguard in the business.

programme.desc: A family spanning three generations comes together over a weekend at their country house to be with their terminally ill mother for one last time.

programme.desc: Raised by a single mom in Korea, Tae Bong has always wanted know who his dad was. He discovers that his dad is a young Chinese man who had donated sperm years ago and sets out to meet him.

programme.title: The Outlaws
programme.desc: In order to maintain peace, a ruthless detective and his ragtag team plan to take down the most feared Chinese gangster in Seoul.

programme.title: Double Patty
programme.desc: The relationship of Woo-ram and Hyun-ji begins when he order a double patty in the hamburger shop she works.

programme.title: Another Child
programme.desc: Two teenage girls struggle through their dysfunctional parents' affair as they found out that one of their fathers is having an affair with the mother of another girl.

programme.title: My Wife Is a Gangster 3
programme.desc: The daughter of a Hong Kong triad boss is accused of killing the leader of their rivals. She goes into hiding in Korea and meets Ki-chul and his crew, who are assigned to protect her.

programme.title: Memories of Murder
programme.desc: Based on a true story, the film follows the path of three detectives as they investigate the grisly rapes and ritualistic killings of local women in small-town of South Korea in 1986.

programme.title: Mother
programme.desc: When her mentally challenged son becomes the prime suspect in a murder, his mother does whatever it takes to clear his name.

programme.title: Kim Ji Young, Born 1982
programme.desc: Kim Ji-young, an ordinary Korean woman in her 30s, suddenly shows signs of being inhabited by her late mother and older sister after she becomes a stay-at-home mother.

programme.title: Go Go 70S
programme.desc: Sang-Kyu and Man-Sik forned a rock band - 'The Devils', who gave shocking yet amusing performances under the autocratic regime.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent Jun
programme.desc: While under the influence of alcohol, an unsuccessful comic book writer draws a comic about his life as a former NIS hitman, and runs into trouble when it gets posted online.

programme.title: My Annoying Brother
programme.desc: An ex-con gets released from prison and re-enters his younger brother's life after he becomes blinded in an accident.
